Katie Piper OBE explained that her "face is made out of a cow" as she opened up about her NHS surgeons' pioneering work. 
The Loose Women panelist, 38, had to have her face rebuilt after she was att… [+3037 chars]

articles.title: Buckingham Palace redraws the royal diary to support the Queen - The Telegraph
articles.description: The rest of the family are taking on some of the Queen’s workload as she takes a step back from public life
articles.content:
Yet, as Dampier points out, that would only happen if the Queen was completely bedridden. Her brain is still pin-sharp shes 100 per cent on the ball mentally, shes just got mobility problems.

articles.author: Alex Hammer
articles.title: Walt Disney World denounces high school drill team performance that used Native American stereotypes - Daily Mail
articles.description: Disney World says it 'regrets' performance by visiting 'Indianettes' drill team that featured American Indian stereotypes including chants of 'scalp them.'
articles.content: Disney World officials say they 'regret' allowing a Texas high school drill team to parade in their park Tuesday with a performance that featured American Indian stereotypes including repeated chants… [+7830 chars]

articles.author: George Simpson
articles.title: Brian May announces streaming of Queen and Paul Rodgers Ukraine concert for relief today - Express
articles.description: BRIAN MAY and Roger Taylor have announced a YouTube special screening of Queen and Paul Rodgers' 2008 Kharkiv concert to raise funds for Ukraine Relief.

articles.title: Comic Relief: Red Nose Day 2022 - being funny for money never looked so bleak - The Telegraph
articles.description: Laughs across the stamina-sapping telethon were few and far between - if only they'd let Stephen Fry swear
articles.content: As one Twitter wag noted, it was a night to turn on the TV and spare a thought for those less funny than ourselves. Welcome to Comic Relief (BBC One and BBC Two): probably not worth watching, definit… [+2033 chars]
